title: WTB/WTT:  Last few T206 to complete the set
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: WTB/WTT:  Last few T206 to complete the set
posts.post_content:
Hello - I'm down to the last few T206 now to complete a set.  Some of the typical harder to find cards, a few HOFs, SL'ers and even some commons - just tougher lately to find in a "reasonable" (as in VCP range or thereabouts) price mid-grade condition.  Some of these I have, just in lower grade - looking to upgrade.  Looking for nice eye-appeal, any holder (PSA/SGC/BVG) - graded 4 to 6 if possible.  

I also have some dupes and others to trade if that's an option.  Many thanks, in advance, for your time and anything you have here that you may be looking to sell/trade!

*Bill Cranston
*Cy Young (Bare Hand)
*Cobb (Green)
*Joe Tinker (Bat On)
*Joe Tinker (Hands at knees)
*Tom Guiheen

$85.00 delivered (includes insurance and delivery confirmation).   PayPal OK



[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/DocCrandallNoCapT206PiedmontPSA4.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/DocCrandallNoCapT206PiedmontPSA4_back.jpg[/IMG]

not the worse one i've seen:D
if interested, we can talk!!

Ed, I have a Coles PSA 5 OM, Cranston PSA 3 OM, Ray Demmitt StL PSA 3, Greminger PSA 5 OM, and O'Hara StL PSA 3 I'd be willing to sell.  If interested, please e-mail at [url]mbowen@bowentaylor.com[/url].

Thanks to all Net54 friends who have helped/offered!  I've added many off the need list in recent weeks and have updated the list of remaining needs as well as some cards I have in lower grades that I would like to see about upgrading.  

Anything you may have here in a 3-6 grade and in VCP price range - please let me know, email, PM, etc.

Many thanks again and happy holidays!
